title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: AAD conditional access support for Teams rooms on Windows

description.newValue:
Microsoft Teams rooms on Windows now support Azure Active directory conditional access support. Admins can configure Teams rooms device's access to Microsoft Teams and Microsoft Exchange online services based on device compliance status. In addition, to make it simpler for our customers, Azure Active Directory Premium 1 license is added to the Room System Standard and Room System Premium and variations of these SKUs for education, government customers. Detailed documentation on how to configure Teams rooms on Windows to use AAD conditional access feature will be published to give IT admins head start for configuring it.
GA date: January CY2022
